Posts.EditableText: Hi, on the room descriptions tab of the 'game' object, about half way down, you will see 'Room description layout', with the order in which you want to display 'room name', 'objects list', 'exits list' and 'description'. Just set the appropriate one to '0'(zero) and it wont display.
